name: Red Draggo's Cherry Quest - Willie's Tiny Games
name_original: Red Draggo's Cherry Quest - Willie's Tiny Games
description:
Red Draggo really loves his cherries, but he's not too great of a flier. Do your best to guide him for me, will you?

Made by Willie Kirby using Pico-8 for CU Boulder's Tiny Games course, with reference to the following Zine: https://mboffin.itch.io/gamedev-with-pico-8-issue1
